document_notes.text:
This update for shibboleth-sp fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2017-16852: Fix critical security checks in the Dynamic MetadataProvider plugin in Shibboleth Service (bsc#1068689).

notes.text: shibsp/metadata/DynamicMetadataProvider.cpp in the Dynamic MetadataProvider plugin in Shibboleth Service Provider before 2.6.1 fails to properly configure itself with the MetadataFilter plugins and does not perform critical security checks such as signature verification, enforcement of validity periods, and other checks specific to deployments, aka SSPCPP-763.
